languages.text: "Почему вы предпочли {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}проигнорировать{/d} предупреждение сотрудника Инквизиции, что длительное пребывание возле гибнущего Райкада Минорис может принести порчу на ваш корабль? Было ли это продиктовано заботой о людях или... запретным интересом?"

"Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"
languages.original_text: "Почему вы предпочли {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}проигнорировать{/d} предупреждение сотрудника Инквизиции, что длительное пребывание возле гибнущего Райкада Минорис может принести порчу на ваш корабль? Было ли это продиктовано заботой о людях или... запретным интересом?"

traits.locale_text: "Why did you choose to ignore the warning of a member of the Inquisition that protracted stay near the dying Rykad Minoris could afflict your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... a forbidden interest?"

"Why did you choose to ignore the warning of a member of the Inquisition that protracted stay near the dying Rykad Minoris could afflict your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... a forbidden interest?"

"Why did you choose to ignore the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

"Why did you choose to ignore the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

"Why did you choose to ignore the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

languages.text: 「異端審問庁の一員が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}警告{/d}したはずだ。死にゆくライカド・ミノリスのそばに長く留まれば、お前の船に腐朽がもたらされる可能性があると。その警告を無視したのはなぜだ？人民を心配していたのか、それとも…禁忌への興味が勝ったか？」
languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

traits.locale_text: 「異端審問庁の一員が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}警告{/d}したはずだ。死にゆくライカド・ミノリスのそばに長く留まれば、お前の船に腐朽がもたらされる可能性があると。その警告を無視したのはなぜだ？人民を心配していたのか、それとも…禁忌への興味が勝ったか？」

languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to ignore the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

languages.text: “审判庭的成员明明警告过你，不要在濒临凋亡的小莱卡德周边逗留，以免飞船遭到腐化侵蚀，可你为什么{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}无视{/d}这样的警告？你这么做，是为了保护你的船员，还是有其他……不可告人的缘故？”
languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

traits.locale_text: “审判庭的成员明明警告过你，不要在濒临凋亡的小莱卡德周边逗留，一面飞船遭到腐化侵蚀，可你为什么无视这样的警告？你这么做，是为了保护你的船员，还是有其他……不可告人的缘故？”

languages.text: «¿Por qué eligió {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignorar{/d} una advertencia de un miembro de la Inquisición cuando le advirtió de que una estancia prolongada en las inmediaciones del moribundo Rykad Minoris podría acarrear la corrupción de la nave? ¿Le motivaba la preocupación por la gente... o algún interés prohibido?».
languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué eligió ignorar una advertencia de un miembro de la Inquisición cuando le advirtió de que una estancia prolongada en las inmediaciones del moribundo Rykad Minoris podría acarrear la corrupción de la nave? ¿Le motivaba la preocupación por la gente... o algún interés prohibido?».

languages.text: « Pourquoi avoir {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignoré{/d} l'avertissement d'un membre de l'Inquisition, qui vous avait {mf|prévenu|prévenue} qu'un séjour prolongé près du monde agonisant de Rykad Minoris risquait de corrompre votre équipage ? Était-ce vraiment pour sauver le peuple ou... pour d'autres raisons moins avouables ? »
languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi avoir ignoré l'avertissement d'un membre de l'Inquisition, qui vous avait {mf|prévenu|prévenue} qu'un séjour prolongé près du monde agonisant de Rykad Minoris risquait de corrompre votre équipage ? Était-ce vraiment pour sauver le peuple ou... pour d'autres raisons moins avouables ? »

languages.text: "Warum habt Ihr die Warnung eines Mitglieds der Inquisition {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignoriert{/d}, dass ein längerer Aufenthalt in der Nähe des sterbenden Rykad Minoris Verderbnis über Euer Schiff bringen könnte? Hat Euch die Sorge um die Menschen angetrieben oder ... ein verbotenes Interesse?"
languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum habt Ihr die Warnung eines Mitglieds der Inquisition ignoriert, dass ein längerer Aufenthalt in der Nähe des sterbenden Rykad Minoris Verderbnis über Euer Schiff bringen könnte? Hat Euch die Sorge um die Menschen angetrieben oder ... ein verbotenes Interesse?"

languages.text: "Neden bir Engizisyon mensubunun, ölmekte olan Rykad Minoris'in yakınlarında uzun süre kalmanın geminde yozlaşmaya neden olabileceğine dair uyarılarını {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}yok saymayı{/d} tercih ettin? Halkın hakkındaki endişelerin nedeniyle mi yoksa gizli bir amacın mı vardı?"
languages.original_text: "Why did you choose to {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadNoExterminatus}ignore{/d} the warning of a member of the Inquisition that a protracted sojourn near the dying Rykad Minoris could bring corruption down upon your ship? Were you driven by your concern for the people or... forbidden interest?"

traits.locale_text: "Ölmekte olan Rykad Minoris'in yakınlarında uzun süre boyunca kalmanın geminde yozlaşmaya neden olabileceğine dair bir Engizisyon üyesinin uyarılarını neden yok saymayı tercih ettin? Halkın hakkındaki endişelerin nedeniyle mi yoksa gizli bir amacın mı vardı?"
